subject: ORDER: #SSN5520
description_text:
Hey, im just wondering when my items will be shipping? I've got some semi important sim races coming up n would just like a heads up!

Thank you in advance



Best Regards,

Oliver Svärd

conversations.body_text: Hi Oliver Svärd,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
